data.comment: The first-half is in progress. Watford get the game underway.
Maikel Kieftenbeld (Birmingham) has received a first yellow card.
In the minute 45, Matt Donohue blows to end the first-half.
The second-half is underway. Birmingham with the kick-off.
Adam Clayton is on a sub for Maikel Kieftenbeld for Birmingham.
In the minute 69, Vladan Ivic (Watford) is making a first substitution, with Stipe Perica replacing Domingos Quina.
Ivan Sanchez is replacing Jake Clarke-Salter for the home team.
Birmingham make their third substitution with Alen Halilovic replacing Jonathan Leko.
In the minute 80, Aitor Karanka is making the team's fourth substitution at St Andrew's Trillion Trophy Stadium with Maxime Colin replacing Josh Dacres Cogley.
Watford have been awarded a penalty in Birmingham...
Kristian Pedersen (Birmingham) sees red and is sent off in Birmingham!
In the minute 85, It's advantage Watford in Birmingham as Troy Deeney scores from the spot to make it 0-1.
The away team replace James Garner with Etienne Capoue.
